cause.description:
CFK is a self sustaining program that refurbishes used computers and redistributes them to low income families that couldn't otherwise afford one. Any systems that fail to find a home are recycled through our complimentary eWaste recycling process that fuels the entire program.
1. No child should be without access to technology.
2. Electronic waste has no place in landfills
cause.mission: refurbish and distribute computers to children that couldn't otherwise afford one.
cause.name: Computers For Kids
